scripts.build: bun x shadow-cljs release frontend backend
scripts.watch: bun x shadow-cljs watch frontend backend
scripts.dev: bun run open && bun run watch
scripts.stop: bun x shadow-cljs stop frontend backend
scripts.preview: bun install && bun run build && bun run start
scripts.test: clear && bun x shadow-cljs compile test && bun x shadow-cljs test
